forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 2am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 51, with temperatures rising to around 54 overnight. West southwest wind 9 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 8am and 2pm. Partly sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West wind 6 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Rain Showers

forecast.name: Saturday

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
